Add complete Plunk & Plunder MVP implementation

Implemented full playable naval tactics game in Unity 6:

Features:
- Hex grid map generator \(500 sea tiles, 25 islands, harbors\)
- Turn-based simultaneous gameplay with 4 players \(1 human + 3 AI\)
- Ship units with sailing visuals and player-colored flags
- Shipyard buildings for ship construction and upgrades
- Economy system with doubloons \(gold currency\)
- Ship deployment to create new shipyards on harbors
- Code-driven UI with main menu, game HUD, tooltips
- Deterministic turn resolution for network safety
- AI controller with pathfinding
- Camera controls \(pan with WASD, zoom with scroll\)

Technical:
- Axial hex coordinate system with flat-top orientation
- Interface-based networking \(offline working, Steam stub ready\)
- All UI created programmatically via UIBootstrapper
- Renderer system for tiles, units, and buildings

Bug fixes:
- Fixed renderer initialization \(changed Start to Awake\)
- Fixed game state accumulation between runs
- Fixed hex interlocking \(flat-top mesh vertices\)
- Fixed EventSystem for standalone builds

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
